original_text: Howl, ye inhabitants of Maktesh, for all the merchant people are cut down; all they that bear silver are cut off.
korean_text: 막데스 주민들아 너희는 슬피 울라 가나안 백성이 다 패망하고 은을 거래하는 자들이 끊어졌음이라

sentences.original_text: for all the merchant people are cut down;
all they that bear silver are cut off.
